A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is a huge disappointment. The Force Awakens created so many opportunities and Last Jedi wasted most if not all of them. Disney did a good job with Rogue One and Force Awakens. Without giving spoilers\, I can say this:\nToo many characters\, subplot merely for social commentary\, odd humor\, and anticlimactic answers to the questions raised in The Force Awakens. Minus 1 star each for those things. The 1 star given is for the action sequences which aren't bad. So many plot elements don't make sense. I truly cannot image how this script advanced through Disney's creative teams. It is 100% understandable to attempt to phase out the original cast and chart new territory\, but this is a mess. Hopefully\, the next film can pick up the pieces and have a plot that is worthy of the series.
